column4: i need a little help setting up conky. I understand how to create a .conkyrc config file. but i downloaded a setup that is in LUA format and it tells me to put it in ~/.conky (but i dont see a .conky file in my home file)
the file needs creating, you ca find sample files on the web
.conkyrc is a file, not a folder
i linked the URL i was going off of, could u take a look and see if u can understand what it wants form me?
